oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A small blue notebook (dated 1913) in which Lloyd lists words and sentences which she took down in Book II

23 (||kabbo) that needed translation. It contains notes to herself and explanations relating to the translation of the terms. There are exact references to lines and pages in the notebook where the terms appear.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some Bushman words to be translated (L.C. Lloyd, June, 1913)
